device-bg-color.tooltip: The background color outside of your boxed layout.

body-max-width.tooltip: The width of your boxed layout. Pixel value recommended (e.g. 1536px)

body-box-shadow.tooltip: The shadow around your boxed layout. Supports any valid box shadow string.

body-margin-top.tooltip: Optional gap between boxed layout and top of viewport.

body-border-color.tooltip: Optional border color defined as one value or separate values per side (top/right/bottom/left).

body-border-radius.tooltip: Optional border radius defined as one value or separate values per corner (top-left/top-right/bottom-right/bottom-left).

body-border-style.tooltip: Optional border style defined as one value or separate values per side (top/right/bottom/left).

body-border-width.tooltip: Optional border width defined as one value or separate values per side (top/right/bottom/left).
